RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 38. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KEY TO THE CASTLE moved to the inside and settled off the pace, started a bid approaching the seven sixteenths pole, closed steadily at the rail rounding the far turn, eased out entering the stretch, ran down ODINA nearing the sixteenth pole and drew away later yards. The latter drew off to a long early lead, came under pressure nearing the quarter pole, raced at the rail through the far turn but was caught flattening stride toward mid-stretch. BANK CARD exchanged contact with TRACE ESTATE leaving the gate, settled off the rail on the first turn and bid toward the seven sixteenths pole, raced near the rail on the far turn and held on for third. The latter exchanged contact with Bank Card leaving the gate then saved ground, bid nearing the seven sixteenths pole and ran evenly to late stretch before flattening stride. SUNSET QUEEN was jostled early, rounded the first turn about the four path, left the turn outside and showed little response through the backstretch. NINETY PROOF was bumped early, rounded the opening turn in the three path and never factored. ONLY ROMANCE came in and made contact with Sunset Queen shortly after the start, raced in the four path the first turn and showed little response.

ENTRY.NAME: Bank Card
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break,off rail,bid 7/16,rail far turn,held on 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Key to the Castle
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside,bid near 7/16,closed gap rail turn,up1/16,drew off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Terri Lyn Hebert & Victor M. Espinosa Sr.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 59. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, For Each $1,000 To $8,000 1 lb. (Races Whe re Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ORANGEBURG rated close off the rail on the first turn, pulled himself to the front three wide at the three eighths pole, was urged clear from the five sixteenths, drew off at the rail on the far turn and was kept alert in the stretch. S S ALASKAN CRUZ saved ground, bid nearing the seven sixteenths pole and rounded the far turn near the rail, eased outward leaving the turn and cleared second inside the sixteenth pole. PETTYFORURTHOUGHTS bobbled at the break, raced with the early pace inside and dueled approaching the three eighths pole but faded at the rail on the far turn. WINDSOR'S TRACKER rounded the first turn in the five path, gave chase past the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the five path of the far turn and passed rivals in the lane. BERNIE THE GAMBLER raced off the rail on the first turn, picked up the chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn about the three path, was carried out toward the eighth pole and flattened in the lane. DEVIL'S CANYON raced with the early pace two deep, dueled nearing the three eighths pole then faded through the far turn. NICE BUT NAUGHTY saved ground on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Orangeburg
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close off rail,up 3wd near 3/8,urged away turn,kept alert

ENTRY.NAME: Pettyforurthoughts
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled break,w/early pace inside,dueled 3/8,faded rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Windsor's Tracker
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5p 1st turn,bid past 7/16,5p far turn,passed rivals lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 32700. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: O'RIGSBY saved ground on the first turn, started a bid into the backstretch and steadily improved, raced off the rail on the far turn, dug in for the lead inside the sixteenth pole and edged clear late yards. TURTLE DOVE took the lead nearing the three quarter pole and moved to the inside to rate the pace, came under pressure leaving the three eighths, rounded the far turn at the rail and dug in from the head of the lane, but was met and relented in later yards. BAD LINEAGE raced well back from early contention while saving ground, started an outside bid leaving the half mile pole, rounded the far turn in the four path and finished evenly while gaining on the early pace-setter. LOVETHEBAND stalked from the three path on the first turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail and weakened in the lane. DR RENDEZVOUS stalked the early pace off the rail, picked up the chase approaching the three eighths pole but faded at the rail on the far turn. JUST MURPHY rated close inside, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole but faded at the rail leaving the five sixteenths.

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Rendezvous
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked off rail,chased 3/8,faded rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: O'Rigsby
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,bid1/2,steadily gained,off rail turn,up & clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Bad Lineage
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back early,outside 1/2,bid,4p far turn,evenly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Turtle Dove
ENTRY.OWNER: CM Racing and Jones Jr Michael E
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,rail far turn,met late,relented

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 14500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. NO WVB CLAUSE.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHURCH KEY took a quick lead and moved to the inside to rate the pace, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole, raced at the rail on the far turn and dug in under steady handling to hold on. VILLAREGGIA raced off the pace in the three and four paths on the opening turn, started a bid approaching the five sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the three path and finished well to take second late, while gaining on the winner. LOVE RAN RED settled off the rail, bid at the seven sixteenths pole and raced close through the far turn, but flattened later yards. STORMI CAT LADY saved ground, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole, raced off the rail on the far turn then angled out into the lane and finished evenly. I B NASTY saved early ground racing well back, gave chase from the three eighths pole, eased outward on the far turn and showed little in the lane. DECISIVE CAUSE rounded the first turn in the four and five paths, raced outside into the backstretch and gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, came through the far turn near the rail and weakened in the lane. RAVIOLI MAMA saved ground, picked up the chase leaving the half mile pole then faded at the rail on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Stormi Cat Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 3/8,off rail far turn,angled out,even finish

ENTRY.NAME: Ravioli Mama
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased past 1/2,faded rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Love Ran Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail,bid 7/16,close far turn,flattened later yards

ENTRY.NAME: Church Key
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,rail turn,held on driving

ENTRY.NAME: Villareggia
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3& 4p,bid near 5/16,3p far turn,finished well,gaining

ENTRY.NAME: I B Nasty
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 3/8,eased out far turn,empty lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 19400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, For Each $1,000 To $8,000 1 lb. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility)(Races Whe re Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NO ME DIGAS settled off the rail on the opening turn, started a bid approaching the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn in the three path, dueled for the lead toward mid-stretch and drew clear later yards. FEARNOUGHT rated close inside on the first turn, gave chase from the three eighths pole and raced near the rail on the far turn, eased out leaving the turn and dug in to take second the final strides. BRIGHT DAWN rated a slim lead into the first turn, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole and rounded the far turn near the rail, was met toward mid-stretch and flattened inside the sixteenth pole. BUBBA G stalked two deep into the first turn, challenged toward the three eighths pole, race close off the rail into the far turn but dropped back midway through the turn and flattened inside the eighth pole. BOP MARLEY raced off the rail on the first turn, picked up the chase from the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the four path and flattened in the lane. EISELE saved ground off the pace and gave chase from the seven sixteenths pole, but flattened at the rail on the far turn. ROCKY DICE steadied lightly at the start, raced well off the pace about the three path and showed little response through the backstretch. GORUN raced well off the pace and off the rail and showed little response through the backstretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Fearnought
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,chased 3/8,rail far turn,up 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: No Me Digas
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off rail,bid 3/8,3p far turn,up near 1/16,dueled clear

ENTRY.NAME: Bubba G
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 13300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 20 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. NO WVB CLAUSE.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALL WORKED UP closed to the lead at the half mile pole and showed the way through the backstretch, widened at the rail on the far turn and held on under steady handling. SHEZA RAJUN CAJUN chased through the backstretch, raced off the rail on the turn and finished well. FLAT OUT COOL gave chase, raced in the four and five paths on the turn and ran evenly in the lane. STOPWATCHSONNY gave chase through the backstretch, checked in tight at the rail nearing the quarter pole, rounded the turn about the three path and ran evenly in the lane. TAKE CHARGE LISA chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn near the rail and ran evenly in the stretch. SPUNKY ZOEY came away awkwardly then gave chase inside, rounded the turn near the rail and showed little in the lane. RIGHT TO ASSEMBLE gave chase, raced in the four path on the turn and passed rivals in the lane. PRETTY SPECTACULAR chased, rounded the turn off the rail, angled to the outside at the head of the lane and passed rivals. JESS FOR KICKS gave chase through the backstretch but was roughed from between horses nearing the quarter pole and faded through the turn. QUEEN OF KANTHAROS chased inside, rounded the turn at the rail and weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Stopwatchsonny
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,checked in tight rail near 1/4,3p turn,evenly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Spunky Zoey
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward break,chased inside,rail turn,little in lane

ENTRY.NAME: All Worked Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,widened rail turn,steady urging lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Special Weight Purse 32700. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MARINA GRANDE was hustled along with the pace inside, inched clear at the rail midway on the turn and held well under steady handling. GALLANT CREED set a pressured pace through most of the backstretch, dropped back two deep midway on the turn, though held on the stretch duel for second. WOODEN SHIPS chased through the backstretch, raced close three deep on the turn then relented in the stretch duel for second. CARMELIZED gave chase, raced two deep on the turn then eased out into the lane and flattened stride. OUR GREAT NOTION was shuffled back at the break, picked up the chase inside, raced at the rail on the turn and weakened in the lane. MEGEEZER gave chase, raced in the three path on the turn and weakened in the lane. POLISH THE DIAMOND chased toward the inside, raced at the rail on the turn and weakened. JUGSY chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn near the rail and showed little in the lane. LIME STAR was not a factor. FLATTERING WAY saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: Marina Grande
ENTRY.OWNER: Jay A Reese LLC and Hatter Edgar
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace inside,inched clear mid turn,held well driving

ENTRY.NAME: Gallant Creed
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,dropped back mid turn,held on 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Starter Allowance Purse 23000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE APRIL 20, 2021. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 20 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 20 Allow ed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIZ THE REASON took the lead past the half mile pole and rated the pace, came under pressure past the five sixteenths pole, rounded the turn near the rail and widened under steady stretch handling. SALSA RITA chased inside, rounded the turn near the rail and dug in through the lane to hold second. COLLEGE KID gave chase, raced in the four path on the turn and got up for third later yards. FLAT DISCOUNT chased through the backstretch, raced in the three path on the turn and ran evenly in the lane. DING DING engaged in close chase, raced close off the rail on the turn but weakened inside the eighth pole. SISTER'S DUTY chased outside, rounded the turn about the five path and showed little in the lane. SHENANDOAH CAT gave chase and saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: College Kid
ENTRY.OWNER: Devane William E and King Adam

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 9 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 39. Maiden Claiming Purse 13300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GREAT DEVOTION set a pressured pace inside leaving the half mile pole, raced at the rail on the turn and dug in under steady handling to hold on. FIDDLERSHOTPLEASUR pressured the pace, raced close off the rail on the turn and finished well at the outside girth of the winner. PRINCESS MIA ROSE gave chase, raced near the rail on the turn and held on for third. MY BEST GIRL chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn in the four path and ran evenly in the lane. DAPPLESANDDIAMONDS chased, rounded the turn about the three path and showed little in the lane. RED LIL SHIPMENT chased outside, raced in the six path on the turn and showed little in the lane. NANNY'S MISSION gave chase inside, rounded the turn near the rail and weakened in the lane. T J STORM VISION gave chase, raced in the four path of the turn and showed little in the stretch. PIPERINTHEPULPIT and MORE TAJ were not factors.

ENTRY.NAME: Great Devotion
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,rail turn,held on driving

ENTRY.NAME: Fiddlershotpleasur
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace,close off rail turn,finished well
